# accessibilityValue()

**Instance Method**

Returns the stepper’s value.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func accessibilityValue() -> Any?
```

## Return Value

The value for the stepper.

## Discussion

This method is the getter for the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAccessibilityProtocol] protocol’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAccessibility-c.protocol/accessibilityValue] property.

## Supporting Accessibility

- **accessibilityLabel()**: Returns a short description of the stepper.
- **accessibilityPerformDecrement()**: Decrements the stepper’s value.
- **accessibilityPerformIncrement()**: Increments the stepper’s value.
